items.title: MUSE Music - AI-Powered Music Platform
items.description: Full-stack music web application with AI-powered lyrics translation, sentiment analysis, and personalized music recommendations. Built with Next.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, and MinIO.

more.title: About MUSE Music
content: MUSE Music is a modern music web application that combines AI-powered lyrics analysis, translation, and personalized recommendations. The platform enables users to discover music, analyze lyrics, and get AI-generated insights about their favorite songs.
Latest version 1.3.0 'Seamless Journey' includes YouTube transcript integration, enhanced fullscreen player, favorites & history system, and comprehensive privacy & legal pages.
features: Music Discovery with YouTube integration
Lyrics Management from LRCLIB with automatic synchronization
AI Analysis for lyrics translation, mood detection, and summaries
User Authentication with JWT, Google OAuth, and 2FA support
Personalization with song ratings and recommendations
Image Management with MinIO object storage
YouTube Transcript Integration for auto-fetching lyrics
Favorites & History System for complete user tracking

items.title: KMUTT Engineering Open House 2025
items.description: Bilingual (TH/EN) website for KMUTT Engineering Open House 2025 built with Astro 5, TailwindCSS 4, and TypeScript. Features i18n support with language switcher, browser-language detection, cookie-based preferences, and deployed on Cloudflare Pages with Edge Functions.

more.title: About KMUTT Engineering Open House 2025
content: A comprehensive bilingual website for KMUTT Engineering Open House 2025 event, featuring full internationalization support with automatic language detection and cookie-based preferences. The project consists of three main components: the main website, survey system, and backend API.
The website is built with modern web technologies and deployed on Cloudflare Pages with Edge Functions for optimal performance and global distribution.
features: Bilingual Support (Thai/English) with automatic language detection
Internationalization (i18n) with custom dictionary system
Language Switcher with cookie-based preference storage
Cloudflare Pages deployment with Edge Functions
Survey System for event registration and feedback
Backend API for data management and processing
Responsive Design with TailwindCSS 4
TypeScript for type safety and better development experience

items.title: Bangmod Hackathon 2025 - Discord Verification System
items.description: A comprehensive Discord verification system for Bangmod Hackathon 2025 that helps students verify their identity and join the Discord server safely. Features Discord bot with /verify commands, web dashboard for admins, student management, and analytics tracking.

more.title: About Bangmod Hackathon Discord Verification System
content: A full-stack Discord verification system designed for Bangmod Hackathon 2025 to securely verify student identities and manage Discord server access. The system combines a Discord bot for seamless verification commands with a web dashboard for administrative management.

Built with modern technologies including TypeScript, React, and PostgreSQL, with Docker support for easy deployment. The system includes comprehensive security features including JWT authentication, password hashing, and role-based access control.
features: Discord Bot with /verify command handling
Web Dashboard for admin management
Student Management system with team support
Step-by-step Verification Flow
Analytics and Usage Statistics tracking
JWT Authentication with secure token validation
Role-based Access Control (Admin/Super Admin)
Docker Support for easy deployment
PostgreSQL Database with migrations and seeds

items.title: Online Mobile Installment System
items.description: Full-stack web platform for mobile phone installment management with product control, payment tracking, and secure iCloud account binding. Built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Go backend.

items.title: Airline Management System
items.description: Complete airline management platform with React.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript (frontend) and Go, GORM, PostgreSQL, JWT Auth (backend). Features responsive UI and secure RESTful APIs.

more.title: About Airline Management System
content: A comprehensive full-stack airline management platform designed for managing flights, bookings, and airline operations. Built with modern technologies and best practices.
features: Flight Management with scheduling and route management
Booking System with seat selection and payment processing
User Authentication with JWT-based security
Admin Dashboard for airline operations
Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
RESTful API with Go backend
PostgreSQL database for data persistence

items.title: Comcamp35 Event Management System
items.description: ComCamp 35 registration website built with React, TypeScript, and Vite. A web-based event management system developed in collaboration with a team to improve event operations efficiency and streamline registration processes.

more.title: About Comcamp35 Event Management System
content: ComCamp 35 registration website is a comprehensive event management system developed collaboratively by a team to streamline event registration and improve operational efficiency. The system was built using modern web technologies including React, TypeScript, and Vite for optimal performance and developer experience.

The project was developed as part of the ComCamp 35 event organization, focusing on creating a seamless registration experience for participants while providing efficient management tools for event organizers.
features: Event Registration System for participants
Team Collaboration with multiple contributors
Responsive Web Design with SCSS styling
TypeScript for type safety and better code quality
Vite for fast development and optimized builds
Modern React patterns and best practices
Event Operations Management tools

items.title: CIRCUITS Project
items.description: IoT development that integrates sensors, microcontrollers, and software control for real-time monitoring.

items.title: Discord Webhook Automation
items.description: Webhook system for Discord to automate submission processes, improving project management efficiency across events.

items.title: Bangmod Hackathon 2025 - Register Website
items.description: A monorepo registration website for Bangmod Hackathon 2025 built with Next.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL. Joined the team to help complete the project before the competition deadline by improving frontend UI and implementing missing business logic.

more.title: About Bangmod Hackathon 2025 Register Website
content: A comprehensive monorepo registration system for Bangmod Hackathon 2025, built with modern full-stack technologies. The project uses Turbo monorepo architecture to manage multiple applications and shared packages efficiently.

This was not my original project, but I joined the team to help complete it before the competition deadline. The team was running behind schedule, so I contributed by improving the frontend UI and implementing missing business logic for critical features. The system includes a Next.js web application for user registration, an Express.js API server for backend operations, and PostgreSQL database for data persistence.
features: Monorepo Architecture with Turbo for efficient builds
Next.js Web Application for registration interface
Express.js API Server for backend operations
PostgreSQL Database with migrations and schema management
Shared Packages for authentication, UI components, and database utilities
Docker Support for development and production environments
pnpm Workspace for efficient dependency management
Database Migrations and Schema Generation
Code Quality Tools (ESLint, Prettier, Commitlint)
GitHub Actions and GitLab CI for CI/CD
